lead_paragraph: A swarm of about 30,000 bees attacked a North Texas couple as they exercised their miniature horses, stinging the animals so many times they died.

headline.main: Thousands of Bees Attack Texas Couple, Kill Horses
headline.print_headline: Thousands of Bees Attack Texas Couple, Kill Horses

snippet: A swarm of about 30,000 bees attacked a North Texas couple as they exercised their miniature horses, stinging the animals so many times they died....
